title: Fragment, 1973-51-104, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed: 2 reds, 2 purples and black.  Yellow and blue are applied by hand.
description: Horizontal and vertical border which coordinate with each other. Piece is made of several smaller fragments pasted together. Horizontal border of flowers and pastoral lozenges. Vertical border of draperies and classical scenes.
